channel.title: How can i take off code encryption?
channel.description: Yea it may sound weird but i wana take off password encryption or somone tell me how to code the encryption so i can tell ppl passwords to them if they forget or lose em. my friend recently lost his acc on my server that way so i wana tell him his pass back :)

item.title: How can i take off code encryption?
item.dc:creator: @Zanzibar Zanzibar
item.description:
@Zanzibar wrote:

Open Client.Java And Find /*PASSWORD ENCRYPTION - IF I EVER NEED A HOST I DON'T NEED TO WORRY ABOUT PW SHIT!*/

Delete Everything From There Untill Here /////////////////////////////END OF ENCRYPTION/////////////////////////////////////////
( You Have To Delete That Too )

Than Find "pass"
Delete String hashPW = md5(playerPass); playerPass = hashPW;
In It

Than Find String hashPW = md5(playerPass); playerPass = hashPW; And Delete That

Save + Close + Compiler + Done

Read full topic
